MYTIL.AT.summary: Mytilineos S.A. operates in metallurgy, sustainable engineering solution, renewables and storage development, and power and gas sectors in Greece, European Union, and internationally. The company's principal business areas include production of electricity and natural gas; operation of industrial and renewable energy plants with a total installed capacity of 1,200 MW; trading of gas; production of alumina and aluminum, as well as bauxite; and production, processing, and trading of metals, which include aluminum alloys and derivative products. Its principal business areas also include development of solar PV and energy storage; contractor of specialized large-scale integrated turn-key projects; provision of environmental solutions for water, liquid, and solid waste; energy solutions; and construction of infrastructure projects, as well as provides range of project management, engineering, procurement, construction, and plant commissioning services. The company was formerly known as Mytilineos Holdings S.A. and changed its name to Mytilineos S.A. in July 2019. Mytilineos S.A. was founded in 1908 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.
